channel.title: Mapping
channel.description: All your DA2 mapping needs can be found here, from help with developing levels to testing and releasing finished maps

item.title: MY map
item.author: invalid@example.com (veryhungryhobo)
item.dc:creator: veryhungryhobo
item.content:encoded: Well i am going to start a map next weekend. Tell me what you want for a good map. And i dont know how to put the player spawns so.....I might be send out a beta in 2-3 weeks.

item.title: (screenshots) DA2-Artifice
item.author: invalid@example.com (Enfyrneaux)
item.dc:creator: Enfyrneaux
item.content:encoded:
[DOWNLOAD] DA2-Artifice (Beta)

Get the map here (~7MB). Please report bugs with screenshots in this thread.

DA2-Artifice said:
Intelligence has discovered an Alliance harvesting installation in an ancient 'mana' energy crystal mine on Kelson Prime. Deactivate the harvester before the ancient crystals are drained any further.
Click to expand...
EDIT - If the mods can change the title of the thread to...

(screenshots) DA2-Artifice

item.title: DA2-SilentArtifact
item.author: invalid@example.com (Klasnic_E)
item.dc:creator: Klasnic_E
item.content:encoded: I want to make a map for DA2 after i texture the backpack, but i barely know how to assault path, so if i design the map, can someone from the team do the assault pathing for me? I'll post pics after i do the backpack

item.title: [Tutorial] Objectives
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dest)
item.dc:creator: Dest
item.content:encoded:
Objectives

Defence Alliance 2 contains at this moment three differant objective types, which are: Destroyable, Touchtable and Useable.
This short tutorial only mentions destroyable, the other objectives are pretty much the same.

Destroyable:



This is the 'static mesh' you need to place into your map as destroyable objective. You can change the staticmesh under 'Display>Staticmesh'

When you have done...

[Tutorial] Objectives
